channel.title: Some NPC's Emote List Includes Chaos Elemental, Tzhaar and more

item.title: Some NPC's Emote List Includes Chaos Elemental, Tzhaar and more
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

These lists are found everywhere rendering this one quite useless.
Plus, do not post things, ask for rep and expect it. You should post things to help others and not yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Some NPC's Emote List Includes Chaos Elemental, Tzhaar and more

@thechoobowner wrote:

[size=36pt][size=12pt][font=times new roman]Tzhaar emote list with Chaos Elemental, Demon, Abyssal Demon, Dragons, Giants, Giant Mole, Dark Beast, Dagannoth
Dagganoth kings, Azinian Avatar, Strange Plant, Baby Dragon, Kurask, Dust Devil and Gargoyle., Ghost , Ninja and Zombie Monkey,all Slayer Monster and more.
[/font][/size][/size]
